column2: The plot backers provide the gun.
A plot backer sees an opportunity.
I do not have enough money.
plot backer does not receive funds.
The framed goes unnoticed by the police.
Police arrests the framed. Plotter is discovered.
Police arrests the framed. Plotter is not discovered.
Framed goes frees. Plotter is discovered.
Framed goes frees. Plotter is not discovered.
[ROOT.GetFirstNameWithNick] has informed me of a plan to frame the target succesfully.
Plotter tells backer to go ahead.
It seems [ROOT.GetFirstNameWithNick] has been framed and now a suspect of murder to the police. Unfortunatly my involvements have been discovered.
It seems [ROOT.GetFirstNameWithNick] has been framed and now a suspect of murder to the police. This has been done without any trace of my involvement.
Wonderful! We shall meet in court.
